mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NUM , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIR_MD , INC_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_CD_LST WHERE CD_DIV_VAL = 'INC_CD' AND CD_VAL = X.INC_CD ) AS INC_NM , MEM_RNK_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_CD_LST WHERE CD_DIV_VAL = 'RNK_CD' AND CD_VAL = X.MEM_RNK_CD ) AS MEM_RNK_NM , EDU_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_CD_LST WHERE CD_DIV_VAL = 'EDU_CD' AND CD_VAL = X.EDU_CD ) AS EDU_NM , CTF_NM , MEM_UNP , MEM_FCST , MEM_CTT , MEM_ADR , AFF_TIM_NAME , AFF_CO_NAME , USR_NUM , CRT_DTM , CRT_USR_NUM , MDF_DTM , MDF_USR_NUM FROM TB_MEM_MST X WHERE 1 = 1 AND MEM_NUM = #{memNum}
